1 Components

Components

1.1 Components.Button

Button

This is a simple button component.

Modifiers for Button

.shiny
This is a big shiny button.
.rusty
This is a rusty button.

Markup for Button

<button type="button" class="button">Hello World!</button>
Modifiers Markup
1.2 Components.Button Group

Button Group

This is a group of buttons.

Markup for Button Group

<ul>
  <li><button type="button" class="button">Hello World!</button></li>
  <li><button type="button" class="button">Hello World!</button></li>
</ul>
Markup
